text: Amazing place, excellent service and food. Also prices are really good. I enjoyed the beautiful decor and I really like how it's named after Arnold Palmer. The management team is very friendly and always come out to speak to the guests. To me that is amazing service

Stopped by for dinner and drinks . Best wings ever !! Spicy Barbecue . Pizza was terrific too. Wonderful server Flo .
Will be back , want to try more things on the menu.
A great selection of sandwiches, appetizers, drinks and an open air elevated view of the driving range - good food, and a nice place for groups and conversation!
